Change IP address on AIX

  1. Backup of the current configuration
    sudo /usr/local/scripts/mksysb.sh adhoc
  2. Capture the current interfaces and corresponding IP addresses,
    lscfg | grep ent
ifconfig -a
netstat -rn
  3. Change the IP address
  4. Check and update /etc/hosts.
  5. Shutdown the LPAR.
  6. Login to HMC and change the VLAN on the NIC.
  7. Ask the Wintel guy to change DNS
  8. Startup the LPAR
  9. Functional tests
    1. ping the gateway
    2. check ssh etc ……
    3. nslookup both “A” record and “PTR” record.
  10. Handover to apps guys to go ahead and test

Backout plan

  1. Change the bootlist to boot from alt disk.
  2. Reboot.
  3. Re-configure the old_rootvg ( Ask Vasu for steps )
